mapper.select: select user_id as userId,user_name as userName,user_head_img as userHeadImg,phone_number as phoneNumber, device_id as deviceId,open_id as openId,union_id as unionId,login_type as loginType,source, identity,fetcher_id as fetcherId,is_fetcher as isFetcher,city,province,country,created,updated from user_base where user_id = #{userId} and is_deleted=0
select id from user_base where user_name like CONCAT(#{userName},'%')
select id from erp_app_info where app_name like CONCAT(#{appName},'%')
select app_name from erp_app_info where id = #{appId}
